title: Competitive Tracking Gets Easier This October | Similarweb
description: October’s fresh new features are live. Here’s how they can help you hone your strategy and grow your market, and where to find them in Similarweb. Go play.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesCompetitive Tracking Gets Easier This October Updates Competitive Tracking Gets Easier This October Start your free trial by Owen Badham , Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb 2 Min. October 28, 2021 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Welcome to this month’s Digital Marketing Intelligence update. Fall’s here and new features have dropped. Get all the topline channel insights you need on your most important competitor set, in one place – the Competitive Tracker. And never miss an opportunity with your improved Email Insights Digest – delivered to your inbox, every month. Read on then go play! Competitive Tracker To make it even easier to discover actionable insights across all your marketing channels, we’ve added a new Competitive Tracker module. Simply choose your website and up to 10 competitors, to highlight changes, trends, and other insights which you can drill down into with a click. Set up your Competitive Tracker. Competitive Tracker Email Digest The all-new Email Insights alert delivers monthly traffic trends based on your competitive sets, straight to your inbox. Discover new channel opportunities, and make the most of new keywords, significant referral domains, and fresh creatives. Your amazing feedback helps us prioritize which features to develop next. Have any thoughts on our latest updates or features you’d like to see? Get in touch via our Live Chat, Social, or through your Account Manager. Thanks for reading. See you next month. by Owen Badham Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb A product marketer with 10+ years in SaaS, specializing in product launches, GTM strategy, and collateral production.
